item.description: Leaky ReLU networks exhibit benign overfitting under surprisingly relaxed conditions: input dimension only needs to linearly scale with sample size, challenging prior assumptions in the field.

item.description: Deep ReLU networks trained with large, constant learning rates avoid overfitting in univariate regression due to minima stability, generalizing well even with noisy labels.
